title: 1.5 Scope of the Status Description
mainContent: The source and base year of the data used in preparing the municipality profile have been disclosed as determined by the National Planning Commission and the Ministry of Federal Affairs and General Administration. This status description has been prepared based on data provided by the municipality's thematic branches, government and non-government offices, other organizations, and data available from various ministries, departments and other sources. According to the concept of the profile, this provides realistic information about all aspects of Chaudandigadhi Municipality in a simple and clear manner. Efforts have been made to make the study as objective as possible. However, due to limitations in resources, means and information management, all the expected information could not be obtained. Nevertheless, the necessary data has been included based on the objectives set in the study.
